select.selectitems: certification document_definition effectivity independent_property_relationship product_configuration product_version product_view_definition requirement_assignment security_classification supplied_part_relationship work_order work_request

material_identification organization product product_category product_configuration product_concept product_version shape_element_relationship

activity alias_identification applied_activity_assignment approval certification contract document_definition product product_configuration product_version product_view_definition security_classification supplied_part_relationship work_order work_request

approval approval_relationship approval_status certification contract document_assignment external_item_identification file_relationship organization_relationship person_in_organization product product_category product_version product_view_definition project project_assignment project_relationship view_definition_relationship

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ( EXISTS ( street_number ) OR EXISTS ( street ) OR EXISTS ( postal_box ) OR EXISTS ( town ) OR EXISTS ( region ) OR EXISTS ( postal_code ) OR EXISTS ( country ) OR EXISTS ( internal_location ) OR EXISTS ( facsimile_number ) OR EXISTS ( telephone_number ) OR EXISTS ( electronic_mail_address ) OR EXISTS ( telex_number ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( item <* SELF \ Identification_assignment . items | NOT ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.ALIAS_IDENTIFICATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( item ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( quantity ) ) OR ( ( NOT ( 'NUMBER' IN TYPEOF ( quantity . value_component ) ) ) XOR ( quantity . value_component > 0 ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: source \ Axis_placement . dim = target \ Axis_placement . dim

where.label: WR1
where.expression: source \ Axis_placement . dim = SIZEOF ( target . translation \ Cartesian_point . coordinates )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF \ Classification_assignment . items | NOT ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.DEFINABLE_OBJECTS' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND definitional ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF \ Classification_assignment . items | NOT ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.CLASSIFIED_ELEMENT_SELECT' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SELF \ View_definition_relationship . relating_view :=: upper_assembly_relationship \ View_definition_relationship . relating_view

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SELF \ View_definition_relationship . related_view :=: sub_assembly_relationship \ View_definition_relationship . related_view

where.label: WR4
where.expression: ( upper_assembly_relationship \ View_definition_relationship . related_view :=: sub_assembly_relationship \ View_definition_relationship . relating_view ) OR ( SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pdr <* USEDIN ( upper_assembly_relationship \ View_definition_relationship . related_view , 'PRODUCT_VIEW_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP_ARM.VIEW_DEFINITION_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_VIEW' ) | pdr . relating_view :=: sub_assembly_relationship \ View_definition_relationship . relating_view ) ) = 1 )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: 'MATERIAL_ASPECTS_ARM.PDM_MATERIAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF ( SELF \ Property_representation . property . base_independent_property )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pvr <* QUERY ( r <* USEDIN ( SELF , 'FOUNDATION_REPRESENTATION_ARM.REPRESENTATION.ITEMS' ) | 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.PROPERTY_VALUE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF ( r ) ) | EXISTS ( pvr . context_of_items . units ) ) ) > 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( ( 'ASSEMBLY_STRUCTURE_ARM.ASSEMBLY_COMPONENT_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELF \ Assembly_component_relationship . quantity ) ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( SELF \ Product_occurrence . occurrence_quantity ) OR EXISTS ( SELF \ Product_occurrence . quantity_criterion ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF \ Product_version_relationship . relation_type IN [ 'supplied item' , 'supplied document' ]

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( secondary_bound ) AND EXISTS ( duration_from_primary_bound ) )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: NOT ( ( ( hour_offset <> 0 ) OR ( actual_minute_offset <> 0 ) ) AND ( sense = exact ) )

entity.name: tolerance_characteristic
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (minimum_tolerance_characteristic, statistical_tolerance_characteristic, symmetrical_tolerance_characteristic, maximum_tolerance_characteristic, plus_minus_tolerance_characteristic, nominal_tolerance_characteristic)

entity.name: unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (amount_of_substance_unit, electric_current_unit, length_unit, luminous_intensity_unit, mass_unit, plane_angle_unit, ratio_unit, solid_angle_unit, thermodynamic_temperature_unit, time_unit)

subtype.constraint.name: alternate_measure_items
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (measure_item_with_precision, numerical_item_with_global_unit, numerical_item_with_unit, value_limit, value_limit_with_global_unit, value_list, value_range, value_range_with_global_unit, value_set, value_with_tolerances)

subtype.constraint.name: value_with_unit_subtypes
subtype.constraint.super.expression: ONEOF (absorbed_dose_data_element, activity_data_element, amount_of_substance_data_element, angle_data_element, area_data_element, capacitance_data_element, celsius_temperature_data_element, conductance_data_element, dose_equivalent_data_element, electric_charge_data_element, electric_current_data_element, electromotive_force_data_element, energy_data_element, force_data_element, frequency_data_element, illuminance_data_element, inductance_data_element, length_data_element, luminous_flux_data_element, luminous_intensity_data_element, magnetic_flux_data_element, magnetic_flux_density_data_element, mass_data_element, power_data_element, pressure_data_element, ratio_data_element, resistance_data_element, scattering_parameter_data_element, solid_angle_data_element, thermodynamic_temperature_data_element, volume_data_element)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( dd <* Product_view_definition | ( NOT ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( dd ) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( dd . defined_version ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pv <* Product_version | ( NOT ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pv ) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT' IN TYPEOF ( pv . of_product ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pv <* Product_version | ( NOT ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PART_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pv ) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PART' IN TYPEOF ( pv . of_product ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pvd <* Product_view_definition | ( NOT ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PART_VIEW_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF ( pvd ) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PART_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pvd . defined_version ) ) ) ) = 0

function.name: types_of_product
function.algorithm: LOCAL category_assignments : BAG OF Product_category_assignment ; categories : SET OF STRING := [ ] ; i : INTEGER ; END_LOCAL ; category_assignments := USEDIN ( obj , 'AP210_ASSEMBLY_REQUIREMENT_ALLOCATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ASSIGNMENT.PRODUCTS' ) ; REPEAT i := LOINDEX ( category_assignments ) TO HIINDEX ( category_assignments ) BY 1 ; categories := categories + category_assignments [ i ] . category . name ; END_REPEAT ; RETURN ( categories ) ;
